articles.description: The footballer's girlfriend, 28, announced the name they had picked alongside a pair of adorable photos which saw the little one sleeping in her cot.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo and his partner Georgina Rodriguez have named their newborn daughter Bella Esmeralda, the WAG revealed in a Saturday Instagram post.
